questions: What do you understand by the bi-party system ? Write its one merit and one demerit. [Board Term–II erm–II,, (Set-68
answers: Bi-party system :  In some countries, power usually changes between two main parties. It is also known as two two party system.  In this system, the government is formed by one party and the other plays the role of opposition. Merit—This Merit— This system allows stability of government as no coalition is there. Demerit—In Demerit— In this system, only two main parties have a serious chance of winning majority seats to form the government.
